text: “Nena: “E inu anthu! Ndithu ine ndine Mtumiki wa Allah kwa inu nonse. (Allah) Yemwe ali nawo ufumu wa kumwamba ndi pansi. Palibe wopembedzedwa mwa choonadi koma Iye. Amapatsa moyo ndi imfa. Choncho, khulupirirani mwa Allah ndi Mtumiki Wake yemwe ndi Mneneri wosadziwa kulemba ndi kuwerenga, yemwe akukhulupirira Allah ndi mawu Ake. Ndipo mtsatireni kuti muongoke.”
